info, facility, caution, capacity, cost,
thumb,
hostidx ) values ( #{type}, #{name}, #{address},
#{addressDetail},

#{addr2},
#{info}, #{facility}, #{caution}, #{capacity}, #{cost},
#{thumb},
#{hostIdx} )
mapper.update:
update spaces set
thumb = #{thumb},
thumb = '',
type = #{type}, name = #{name}, address = #{address},
addressdetail = #{addressDetail},
addressdetail = '',
addr1 = #{addr1},
addr2 = #{addr2},
addr2 = '',
info = #{info}, facility = #{facility}, caution = #{caution}, capacity = #{capacity}, cost = #{cost}

select idx, type, name, address, addressdetail, addr1, addr2, info, facility, caution, capacity, cost, regdate, hostidx, status, thumb from spaces where idx = #{idx}
select pictureidx, spaceidx, src, thumbsrc from space_pictures where spaceidx = #{idx}
mapper.update: update spaces set status = 3 where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from liked_spaces where spaceidx = #{spaceIdx} and midx = #{mIdx}
mapper.delete: delete from liked_spaces where spaceidx = #{spaceIdx} and midx = #{mIdx}
mapper.select: select spaceidx, count(score) as count, avg(score) as avg from space_review where spaceidx = #{idx} group by spaceidx

select gm.profilesrc, sr.residx, sr.spaceidx, sr.picturesrc, sr.thumbsrc, sr.score, sr.midx, sr.mnickname, sr.content, sr.regdate from general_members gm, space_review sr where spaceidx = #{spacesVO.idx} and gm.midx = sr.midx
order by regdate desc
order by score
order by score desc
limit #{start}, 5
select distinct addr1 from locations;
select addr2 from locations where addr1 = #{addr1}
mapper.insert: insert into reservations( midx, spaceidx, peoplenum, startdate, enddate, rsvhours, cost, usedpoint, totalcost ) values ( #{mIdx}, #{spaceIdx}, #{peopleNum}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{rsvHours}, #{cost}, #{usedPoint}, #{totalCost} )
insert into points ( residx, midx, content, amount, balance ) values ( #{resIdx}, #{mIdx}, #{content}, #{amount}, #{balance} )
mapper.select: select s.type, s.name, s.address, s.addressdetail, s.hostidx, s.thumb, r.* from spaces s, reservations r where s.idx = r.spaceidx and residx = #{resIdx}

select a.residx, a.midx, a.spaceidx, a.peoplenum, a.startdate, a.enddate, a.rsvhours, a.resdate, a.rsvstatus, b.idx, b.type, b.name, b.address, b.addressDetail, b.addr1, b.addr2, b.thumb from reservations a, spaces b where a.enddate >= now() and a.spaceidx = b.idx and a.midx = #{mIdx} and a.rsvstatus = 0 order by startdate;

select a.residx, a.midx, a.spaceidx, a.peoplenum, a.startdate, a.enddate, a.rsvhours, a.resdate, a.cost, a.usedPoint, a.totalCost, a.rsvStatus, b.idx, b.type, b.name, b.address, b.addressDetail, b.addr1, b.addr2, b.thumb from reservations a, spaces b where a.spaceidx = b.idx and a.midx = #{mIdx}
order by resdate desc
and date(a.resdate) = #{start} order by resdate desc
and date(a.resdate) >= #{start} and date(a.resdate) <= #{end} order by resdate desc
and date(a.startdate) = #{start} order by startdate desc
and date(a.startdate) >= #{start} and date(a.startdate) <= #{end} order by startdate desc
limit #{startRow}, 10;
select count(*) from space_review where residx = #{resIdx}
